mapper.insert: insert into hm_value(bno, mno, rater, price) values (#{bno}, #{mno}, #{rater}, #{price})
mapper.select: select bno, sum(price) as price from hm_value where bno=#{bno};
select rater, price, vdate from hm_value where bno=#{bno} order by vdate desc limit 8;
select price from(select price, max(price) over() max_g, min(price) over() min_g from hm_value where bno=#{bno}) as min where price = max_g or price=min_g;
select max(price) as max from hm_value where bno=#{bno};
